channel.title: Help with client compile to jar
channel.description:
please help me compile the demo version of bluurrs client with the ip bloodscapei.hopto.org so my members can play on a simple version of the client with no buttons at the top
IVE TRYED THE SEARCH BAR FOR ABOUT 3 DAYS LOOKING FOR A ANSWER

item.title: Help with client compile to jar
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.source: Help with client compile to jar

item.title: Help with client compile to jar
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

I’ve done that before, it’s pretty complicated.

First go into client.java and search for the captions that are on teh top of the client.

Remove all things to do with it.
Compile.
You WILL get errors.
Go ahead and remove everything that the errors say.

I don’t exactly remember how to change the IP to a certain IP, although it obviously can be done.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with client compile to jar

item.title: Help with client compile to jar

item.description:
@Fireweaver0 wrote:

Post here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,138.0.html

and take that ip off or it will be considered advertising.
